hymn.title: 2012 Winter Training Banner Song 2
hymn.notes: The Crystallization-Study of Daniel and Zechariah

layout.singingstanza: The o -- ver -- com -- ers as the shin -- ing stars are a du -- pli -- ca -- tion of Christ as the liv -- ing Star, The o -- ver -- com -- ers as the shin -- ing, as the shin -- ing stars are a du -- pli -- ca -- tion of Christ as the liv -- ing Star, and they are the mes -- sen -- gers of the church -- es, those who are one with Christ as the Mes -- sen -- ger of God and who pos -- sess the pre -- sent Christ, and who pos -- sess the pre -- sent Christ as the liv -- ing and fresh mes -- sage, the liv -- ing and fresh mes -- sage sent by God to His peo -- ple.

lyrics.stanza: The overcomers as the shining stars Are a duplication of Christ as the living Star, The overcomers as the shining, as the shining, as the shining stars Are a duplication of Christ as the living Star, And they are the messengers of the churches, Those who are one with Christ as the Messenger of God And who possess the present Christ, And who possess the present Christ As the living and fresh message, The living and fresh message sent by God To His people.
